fields.name: Bones (10x, Charge 5%):
fields.value: Attack a player with 0.1x Attack Power. If they are Evil, they receive the message *You felt your sins crawling on your back.*, then you will also attack them with 0.1x Attack Power next night. Attack Power from multiple Bones attacks at once add together. You may use as much ammo as you want to repeat this process

fields.name: Gaster Blaster (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3.  Attack a Player with 1.5x attack power. If they are Evil, they receive the message *Doomed to death of KARMA!*, and, if you live the next day and night, will die the next morning

fields.name: what? you think i'm just gonna stand there and take it? (Passive):
fields.value: If you are attacked, you will automatically consume unused bones to temporarily increase your defense power by 0.1x per bone until you run out of bones or have enough defense power to live
